name: dtSearch Index File
summary: Learn about .IX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: IX files are saved in an XML format and are named using the following convention, where "X" is a character chosen by dtSearch: index_X.ix.
dtSearch is available in the following versions:

description: Index file created by dtSearch, a program used for text searching; contains index search information, including filters, exclusions, locations, and crawl depth; used to direct searches and filter search results.
